website_summaries.verdict: Traditional gumball machine style that can dispense different kinds of candy and hold your coins.
pros: Takes any kind of coin or works without coins
Money is stored in the base
Heavy and well made for the price
Includes protector on dispenser tray to keep candy from falling out
cons: Has a "free-spin" option that can be a little difficult to figure out how to use

customer_reviews.title: Great Classroom Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with pencil top erasers! Totally works! I had to set it to the smallest dispensing size which was easy enough with a phillips head screwdriver. Sometimes it drops more than one eraser, but its rare. Overall very fun classroom edition and my students love it. Now they are funding the purchase of additional classroom supplies. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Bad service
customer_reviews.text: Well made item real glass but I recieved a defective one i believe. My machine will spin multiple times after coin is inserted and not dispense any gum. The customer service is subpar slow response and limited options seems like they could care less. My suggestion on purchase is I believe most will work but dont depend on seller if it doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: Jcall55

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the cost of it. Works very well also. Bought two of them as christmass presents for two college kids. Now almost a year later both are still being used and work. Only thing I was told is sometimes they chew up the M&M's but I'm guess they just need to be adjusted to handle them. They also work great with mike n Ike's. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is the glass is kinda thin. If dropped or you over tighten the top it will break. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly small
customer_reviews.text: Bummed that the shoot holder is so small. If you intend on putting anything else other than gum balls in here beware that it is very hard to get out. Especially if you have large hands. I purchased this for work to hold my M&M's because I was tired of some of my co-workers banging the spoon on my ceramic dish. I didn't want it to get broken so I figured this would be a great option. Only now my M&M's might get stale because no one is coming to get any because they have such a hard time getting them out.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine my kids love
customer_reviews.text: Great gumball machine my kids love. Best thing about it is that it accepts all coins so you don't have to worry about a coin getting stuck because it's too big/small like previous machines we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not for germaphobes
customer_reviews.text: I believe that you must have coin to dispense I prefer one that allows you to pause midway to dispense more The tray that holds the output is tiny and the pointless plastic cover makes it difficult to clean. I would recommend a device that dispenses directly into your hand to reduce spread of germs and unnecessary bits to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robin NYC

customer_reviews.title: A step back in time
customer_reviews.text: The gumball machine was purchased as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it. With a little instruction from her parents, she is easily capable of inserting the coins and turning the handle to receive her treat. Even little sister can do it. The body is heavy cast metal with a glass (not plastic) globe dispenser. It is well made and with care should last for many years. It holds 2lbs of skittles or M & M's.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ramlow

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh...my 4 year old grandson just loved this. He is so kind, as he offers him to everyone and asks what color they want, as if they had a choice..lol I make sure his cup of pennies is always full and find he does not abuse the fact of using too much gum. What a great gift this was for him. Very sturdy machine, works very smoothly and when the gum is dispensed there is a plastic cover over it so the gumball does not fall out onto the floor. Very well made gumball machine and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good machine, challenging disassembly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent machine. My kid's friend learned the hard way that the plastic stopper in the bottom can get stuck inside. I had to unscrew the bottom to retrieve it. Maybe better have an adult be in charge of coin removal. The 3 stars is because it is an absolute pain in the rear to convert it to free play mode, unscrewing it requires specialty tools that we didn't have. We got clever with a drill bit screwdriver and a wrench, but it would've been nice if the specialty tool were included.
customer_reviews.author: Wittenburg

customer_reviews.title: Authentic quality
customer_reviews.text: This item was on my neice's Birthday list. We were impressed with the quality and detail of the item. She loved it! It definitely exceeded my expectations as I thought it would be lightweight and not good quality. Definitely impressed and recommend if someone on your list is asking for a gumball machine!
customer_reviews.author: pkg

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY, GLASS BROKE WITHIN SECONDS
customer_reviews.text: I would highly advise against this product, as it shattered within seconds of my kids and I putting gum balls into the dispenser. It was very dangerous for the kids to be near it as it shattered into hundreds of pieces. One of the worse quality items we have ever received.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Patel

customer_reviews.title: A well constructed, adorable little gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, my son has been dying for a gumball machine. I got this as a reward for FINALLY moving upstairs into his bedroom and was very pleased with the item! Well constructed out of metal (not plastic) and looks just adorable in his room. Works great with any type of coin - he loves saving his money for a gumball. Just fair warning: the machine requires the SMALL gumballs. We made that mistake, which left us with a very sad little boy when the large ones arrived, but couldn't work. Look for gumballs about the size of a large skittle. It would work great for other kinds of candies like M&Ms and skittles.
customer_reviews.author: KPBH1983

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Skittles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gumball machine to use as a Skittles dispenser in my 2nd grade classroom. My students had been earning 2 Skittles for completing certain assignments, and I had gotten exhausted from hearing "I need some Skittles!" The drawback is that the gumball machine dispenses anywhere from 3-6 Skittles at a time, so we have adjusted our criteria for earning them. Any coin seems to work in the slot, although plastic toy money definitely gets stuck (I think it's too thick). The jam was simple enough to clear with a small screwdriver in the opened base. I'm excited to try other candy next!
customer_reviews.author: MsIssippi

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Does NOT fit 1” gumballs
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality gum ball machine. Very heavy and sturdy. I thought it dispensed 1” gumballs so I now have $20+ worth of gumballs that don’t work in this machine since the largest that will ft are 1/2”. I guess that’s my fault for not reading the description and/or the existing reviews more carefully :( I will be purchasing smaller gumballs so the kids can enjoy using this machine at home :)
customer_reviews.author: DMade

customer_reviews.title: It took my money and won't give me a gumball
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Sometimes it take the money and gives back nothing. The stupidest thing is the suggestion is that it teaches kids to save money. It teaches kids to put money into a gumball machine then take the money out. It has served the purpose of me showing the 4 yo granddaughter that she should buy at least five and put them all in her mouth at once.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Glass is to thin broke as put it together. Not easy to set ut to just one. Horrible product. You know kids will be using so why make so delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for classroom use. Great incentive for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works well. However, I moved it down from the shelf to keep it out of reach of my students and the gumballs shifted and cracked the thin glass and glass chunks fell out along with most the gumballs. There were pamphlets showing how to buy extra parts in the flimsy box, but machine was well packaged. Just have not done it yet. Overall, will be happy when I replace the glass insert.
customer_reviews.author: Huskertwin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a coworker for christas, as he likes gum. The machine is really beautiful, and pretty heavy. I would defiantly agree the the dome should be treated with care, but really, anything glass should be treated gently. It was a well received gift and looks nice on his desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: More times than not nothing comes out when you turn the handle. Thought this would curb wanting to go to the grocery store all the time to spend their earned quarters. However they don’t want to put them in this any more as they often nothing comes out on a turn. I know we can set it to dispense with no money, but that defeats the purpose of not getting something until they earn it. I might take it to work and put jellybeans in it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Illini75

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for 14 years - still working well. Sometimes the coins stick a bit, but probably just needs cleaning. I bought a second one as a gift for colleagues, who loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Brafman

customer_reviews.title: It broke withing first 20 minutes of normal use
customer_reviews.text: This broke within the first 20 minutes of normal use. The glass is incredibly thin and when a gumball hit the side of it the glass broke. Otherwise, this is a really fun toy. Another thing I disliked is that even when we adjusted how many would come out of the machine, at the max setting and using small gumballs, only two at the most would ever come out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I'd buy another
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I use it with JellyBelly jelly beans; holds approx. 3lbs. Adjusted for minimum drop it usually drops 4. As others have noted, they scaled down the original machine forgetting users' fingers would not be scaled down. VERY hard to get small candies out. I'm using a demitasse spoon; makes it MUCH easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: The unit is just a good operating unit.
customer_reviews.text: You could use this commercially but I think its more a home toy. I can't believe how neat the coin operation is. Love it. I'm happy to use it. A toy I owned when I was a kid and it keeps me honest with laundry quarters at the ready -- saved.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smooth

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this gumball machine.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this gumball machine. It is definitely breakable and easy for my son to open and steal gumballs, but it looks nice and it is exciting for my kids to use, and it did not cost much. It made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Neug

customer_reviews.title: Works great and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old son loves this gumball machine! He is too young for gum, so we put skittles candies and 3-4 come out at a time. He is able to put the money in and turn the handle himself. It works great every time. It seems sturdy and just like the metal ones at the stores. It even fell off the table once and did not break (but we don't intend to test that feature again).
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sumimoto

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the gum ball machine. Works well with quarters. The glass ball seems to be study enough. I was concerned that it would arrive broken. So far so good. We are using this for rewards for using the potty with my grandson and its working. No accidents for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine.
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect gumball machine... I was looking for something not too big or too small for my daughters candyland theme party and this fitted in very well. Now when I received it... it was only working when you put in quarters but if you follow the instructions you’re able to remove that for free play.
customer_reviews.author: Tac

customer_reviews.title: Look Authentic !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my soon to be 7 year old grandson . I wish it was a little more sturdy . He is hard on his things , so I don't know how well it will hold up . However , I had no idea that gumball machines were so pricey ! By the time a bought two bags of gumballs to fill it and the machine , I'm in for about $70 ! Hope he likes it !!!
customer_reviews.author: baby boomer

customer_reviews.title: Glass is very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. I like that it can work with any coin, which means that I can send it overseas and the local coins work fine. Almost every part of it feels pretty sturdy except for two parts. The bottom is cheap plastic, no doubt chosen to prevent customers from engineering their own stands. And the glass is extremely fragile. Our glass cracked after a single day of light use. Unfortunately, because this was a gift purchased weeks in advance, we are outside the return window and I am out of luck. Lesson learned. I recommend going for a larger and more sturdy model.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Roby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute style
customer_reviews.text: Super cute style. When I received it I was disappointed to see that the plastic piece on the front (door) was broken. I have to send it back and buy a new one. Hope it’s not broken again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Couchq

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one I had as a kid!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the one I had as a kid except for the bottom. I remember the bottom being all metal, but everything else is exactly the same! It dispenses one gumball at a time and can take any coin. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 9 year old grandson for his birthday. He loved it. First I got the large gumballs and they were too large....so had to purchase the medium sized gumballs. They fit in the machine well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute! it took a while to remove the latch for payment (coins) but once i figured it out - i got it and it will be easy to put back on if wanted to charge for my candy. Great investment - i might buy another just to get a few extra change.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and made well. You can put pretty much any small candy in there. Takes any size coin and easy to get the coins out as well. Both kids and adults like it
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but regular 1/2 inch size gum balls ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, but regular 1/2 inch size gum balls kept getting stuck in the drop mechanism, so would have to shake, and often completely dismantle, just to get working again. Finally, kids shattered fragile glass ball by tightening lid too tight after having to try to dislodge yet another stuck gum ball.
customer_reviews.author: M pjay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gumball machine. It is glass and not plastic like some others out there. Takes all coins. It does not come with gumballs or candy. We put m & m's in ours. Great gift for our kids. They love it a lot. Seems to be great quality
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Works perfectly, is strong and well made. It is an amazing incentive that I use with my kids to get them to do things they dont want to, like night potty train, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that stated that the globe was very fragile. I took a chance anyway. Guess what? The globe is very fragile. Within 24 hours it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 yr old daughter as she LOVES bubblegum. All her siblings like it also so thought it would be good for them to contribute to her “piggy bank” now they are all stealing my change so I’ve announced it’s my bank 😂 yes I know I can switch it to just dispense but then I’d go through a whole bag of gum in a day so least it’s rationed with using money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 year old son. He lives getting gum balls at the stores and this was a perfect alternative. It takes real money and accepts all coins which are then stored as a bank. He is learning the cost of his wants and we use the money in the bank to purchase more gum balls. It seems sturdy but not for use as a toy (as my 4 yo thinks), but I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Strait

customer_reviews.title: Gumball machine works!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement because our old machine cracked. The handle on the gumball machine is a bit difficult to twist. We had to take it apart and adjust the internal metal parts a couple of times. It serves the purpose though and we are happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: kachow9

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product your kids and you will enjoy for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Well the glass can be broken, but the metal machine won't break easily. It's well made and kids can tell it's not a toy but "a real gumball machine". I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came on a stand... I have 2 little ones and use it as a reward system... it has real glass and afraid if let unattended. They would break it... but they love to put any type of coin in the machine and get a gumball... it it really lite and need to be used under adult supervision
customer_reviews.author: nina lee

customer_reviews.title: Unique birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: What else do you get an 11 year old boy that you don't know really well? It seemed well worth the price. I have no idea if the child uses it or keeps filled with the gum balls that we bought too, but my son was proud to wrap and bring it to the party because he knew it was unique.
customer_reviews.author: SAB in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I got multiple of these for Christmas for my girls. They are super cute, and work good! We puts runts in some, and small gumballs in the others.
customer_reviews.author: weylin sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our nephew. He loved it and can't wait to start his road to entrepreneurship by selling gumballs to his family. No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a gum ball machine and received a pack of gumballs and no machine...i had already ordered 2 packs of gumballs to put in the machine, so for Christmas my son got 3 packs of gumballs with NO Gumball machine. Im obviously returning
customer_reviews.author: Nadeane c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This will be the third one for the cat cafe, but that it's not the gumball machines fault! This time we velcroed it to the table! Great quality. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Evans

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on those cheap plastic gumball machines that break within days or weeks of purchase. This a well made metal and glass machine that my grandchildren use several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: C in BTR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present for nephew
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew’s birthday when he specifically asked for a gumball machine (thinking he would not actually get one). He was so surprised and loves it! I inspected it before gifting it to him and it came in perfect condition. The metal and glass construction give it a solid and very durable feel. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: cupcakes&waffles

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic gift
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these as a child and received this one as a Christmas gift. I'm very happy with the machine and the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Leese

customer_reviews.title: Gumballs
customer_reviews.text: I love this gumball machine! It's easy to fill and use. It takes any type of coin, making it also a great little coin bank.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids happy
customer_reviews.text: I have on that I put skittles in and I bought one for each of my kids for my grandkids and I bought skittles to put in them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wanna chew ya gotta pay!
customer_reviews.text: My niece went crazy and she made everybody pay her to get some gum! I personally gave her all my change
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s what you would expect but the glass is pretty fragile so be careful. It broke when I put gum balls in it but the customer service was great and they replaced it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zink

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if mine came with a missing screw or what, but the glass top will NOT stay on! The slightest touch or movement will make the glass piece off, and if you have this around kids it can be very dangerous(which is why I purchase mine for my class). It is essentially unusable and a total waste of money. I would highly suggest not to buy this if it is going to be around kids.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: High quality, classic gum ball machine. Super cute. My kids love it. I wish it had a key lock on the bottom so they can't take the money out. They are cheating the system! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what the little guy wanted. Good heft to it so it won’t knock over easily. Easy to fill. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Gal

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We loves this at first... then it quit registering money so we cant get any gumballs. The mechanical coin stuff appears to be broken...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wiseley

customer_reviews.title: adds a little bit of color
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with multi colored gum balls and use it as a decoration for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gum ball machine for marbles
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always liked the idea of a gum ball machine for displaying marbles so I found this one at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. We made ours to where it didnt need the coin... the directions for that process were a little unclear. But the hubs managed. My 7 yr old was excited
customer_reviews.author: Lori Brown

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old, he loves it. He loves that it takes all coins and I like that it looks really nice on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Cute Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute and sturdy gumball machine. The only issue is the lid does not fit flush on the top. It is raised on one side of the top. Otherwise, it works well. This was a gift for my six year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it helps my kids want to save their money and get a gumball at the same time one thing is every once in awhile not all the time the deal jams I have to turn it upside down and then it will unjam
customer_reviews.author: Economy Tree Service LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the office its great to look at like the originals and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome classroom gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect teachers gift! I had take it apart to put it in the free mode, so she didn’t worry about having to put money in it each time. I filled it with Skittles! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have loved this gumball machine. You can put in any candy that fits through the opening, which is fun to mix it up. Perfect for a treat after chores are done!
customer_reviews.author: Sally H

customer_reviews.title: We liked
customer_reviews.text: Nice original machine but hatd to keep people from jus turning it up and eating from bottom. Theives
customer_reviews.author: pattycake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and works well...
customer_reviews.text: Greatest gift ever for our son. Now we don’t have to worry about the germ infested ones at the stores. Works awesome too!!
customer_reviews.author: BML444

customer_reviews.title: I loved this. It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. It’s nice, and not junky at all. High quality, it takes all coins. My nieces loved it!!! Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4yr old nephews birthday and love the size, sturdiness, and value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love that this was not cheaply made. Glass and metal. The fact it’s a bank too is an added plus! Thanks for such great service and the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Stout

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a retro gift, this is what your looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. aesthetically pleasing, and functional. This machine looks, feels, and operates like you would expect it to. I have purchased two over the years (not due to failure, but rather to the globe meeting with the principles of gravity).
customer_reviews.author: Dan Feasel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good machine and it worked well. The only complaints that I have is that the coin slot gets jammed when you try to use a dime. But other than that, this worked really well and it is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: T W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun for grandkids. Looks nice and works well with m&m’s.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Raven

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Seems strong but coin got stuck in there so it broke within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works great! Sometimes, the coin will not disburse any gumballs and it will take 3-4 coin inserts to get one out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Works well and I love that it's a bank and accepts all coins. Or set to free gum..
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Constantly breaks and won't release the gumball ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Constantly breaks and won't release the gumball even after you turn the handle. I literally have had to take it apart and out it back together 10x and each time I fix it, it works 2x and then breaks again. Totally frustrating for kids. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gougon

customer_reviews.title: Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids and small amounts of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with quality.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this birthday present. A sturdy piece for a 6 year old who loves his gum balls. Easy to use. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: We bought all three grand kids this bank/gumball machine. Nice weight, not cheap looking. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Well built unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy gumball machine. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: More than half plastic. The one I had previously was metal and glass and of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: s-wong

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it looks perfect on my desk at work
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Novelty Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loved it for Christmas! We keep it on the entertainment center. The 2 pound bag if gumball they suggest fills it right to the top! Lovely novelty gift for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Macionski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Valentines gift for my grand babies !! I put personalized m&m’s of each child on them . They loved it
customer_reviews.author: juju1957

customer_reviews.title: wish the glass globe was a bit more rugged, ...
customer_reviews.text: wish the glass globe was a bit more rugged, our first one bust when it fell off a end table onto very padded carpet. the glass was hard to clean up because of all the small glass slivers. dangerous for small children. other than that works great
customer_reviews.author: crdaniels

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love the Classic glass and metal gumball machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great finishing touch for my wife’s office. Perfect size. Glass and metal is nice. Careful not to tighten glass globe to much. Can use either with a coin or switch to operate without.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Berardi

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: fantastic, i bought this for my little brothers birthday because he has an obsession with change and skittles so i figured why not combine them. it was affordable and probably his favorite gift i love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my daughter 9th Birthday gifts. It was a great unexpected gift. I told her to tell her siblings it only take quarters...😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: OPINIONATOR

customer_reviews.title: Globe is cracked.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and The globe on the gum ball machine is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Voodoo woman

customer_reviews.title: filled with goodies!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for our rec room. One filled with M&M's and one with peanuts. Goes nicely with our red popcorn maker.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son - he’s in college and loves bubble gum. He got a kick out of it!! It’s actually very good quality, sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: More than just gum
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present. Filled it with M&M’s and it was a hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real person review
customer_reviews.text: It looks so good and exactly what I wanted, but it didn’t allow normal size gum balls. I think it was the 19.1mm or 22.2mm type. I also tried opening it more (which it can do) and it would go further. I’m not mad, but wish I could’ve measured it so it’s a bad on my end. Will use for snacks tho!
customer_reviews.author: Jace Kocurek

customer_reviews.title: Seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute & fun. kids are learning the value of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Three Cherries ?
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased a couple over the last several years...this one is OK....it sometimes give ONE, sometimes MORE; and sometimes NONE! Almost like a slot machine...LOL Grandson loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Col. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: glass globe is a safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Glass globe is very poor constructed. Broke on first day and nearly cut my 4 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Control

product_meta.title: CAROUSEL Classic Jr Gumball Machine Bank
product_meta.description:
The original Junior Carousel Gumball Machine is a smaller version of the classic gumball machine that set the standard for bubble gum machines when they were first introduced in the 1920's - almost 90 years ago. This brand new replica antique gumball machine is guaranteed authentic made by Carousel/Ford Gum Machine. Don’t settle for cheap imitations!

At 11.5” tall, this old fashioned gumball machine is perfect for home, office or dorm room use. It’s also a great gumball machine for kids because it works as a gumball machine bank that helps teach how to save money. Kids of all ages love to put a coin in and guess which color they’ll get!

Junior Carousel Gumball Machine Features: 
- Real glass gumball machine globe
- Cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism
- Accepts any coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies) 
- Includes instructions for "free spin” to work without coins
- Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full
- Anti-spill gumball chute door cover
- Machine comes fully assembled in a gift box
- Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller), candy, or nuts
- Gumball capacity: 2 lbs. of .62" gumballs
- Dimensions: 12"H x 8”W
- Weight: 5 lbs. 
- Color: Classic red finish
- 30-day money back guaranteeAvailability: Plenty in stock! Your order will ship the same day if its placed before 12:00pm Mountain Time Mon-Fri. Otherwise your order will ship on the next business day.

Great gift idea! This is a great gumball machine for kids - it works as a bank that rewards them with a gumball every time they put a coin into their savings. The smaller photo above shows the Junior Carousel’s colorful gift box (shipped in a plain outer box).

Includes instructions for "free spin to work without coins
Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller), candy, or nuts
